column2: Reason for sac: Illness (not moving well, hunched, ungroomed)
Skull intact as far as I could determine
Brain was slightly abnormal -- bulging from rear-right but intact; possible hydrocephaly
Possible primary tumor between rear-right skull and skin (very tiny mass -- will need H&E to determine if malignant)
The possible primary tumor was added to formalin, not enough tissue for cryogenic or cell line
Brain and lungs were added to formalin
Lungs had countless nodules ranging from small to massive
